## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(4.0, -63.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -63.0) with no ingredients to smelt and currently powered by coal.

### Lab
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position not specified) with input for automation science pack and currently has no power.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to harvest resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you are trying to harvest before attempting to harvest.
